description: This file defines a Flutter widget screen for inspecting and debugging the local SQLite database within the application. It allows developers to view database path, tables, and indexes, mainly used for development and debugging purposes. It imports a utility class to perform database inspection.

classes.name: DbHealthCheckScreen
classes.description: Main widget class for displaying database health information.

classes.name: _DbHealthCheckScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the logic and UI of the DbHealthCheckScreen, including database inspection and error handling.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the widget state and triggers the first database inspection.

methods.name: _load
methods.description: Performs asynchronous inspection of the database and updates UI state with the info or errors.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the Flutter widget tree for the database health check UI.
